short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the KeepKey Browser Extension

The KeepKey Browser Extension is your key to managing multiple blockchain assets with enhanced security and seamless dApp integration, all from within your browser.

- Support for Multiple Blockchains: Easily switch between blockchains like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Binance Smart Chain. Manage your assets across different networks through a single, secure interface.

- Seamless dApp Integration: With support for EIP-6963, KeepKey mounts window.ethereum as a provider, ensuring compatibility with popular DeFi platforms like Uniswap, Compound, and SushiSwap. Secure your interactions with hardware-backed protection.

- Track Your Transactions: Stay informed with full transaction history tracking. KeepKey allows you to monitor blockchain interactions across networks with real-time updates and detailed records.

Why Choose KeepKey?

- Trusted security from KeepKey hardware wallets.
- Clean, intuitive interface designed for both beginners and experienced users.
- Cross-platform compatibility for easy access wherever you go.

Get Started:

1. Buy a KeepKey hardware wallet.
2. Install the KeepKey Browser Extension.
3. Securely manage your assets with confidence.

Download the KeepKey Browser Extension now and experience the return of trusted security and ease of use.
long.ko:
Welcome to the KeepKey Client

The KeepKey Client is your ultimate tool for managing and securing your cryptocurrency assets. With an intuitive interface and robust features, it simplifies your crypto experience while ensuring top-notch security.

Key Features:

Secure Asset Management: Manage a wide range of cryptocurrencies with the highest level of security provided by KeepKey hardware wallets.
User-Friendly Interface: Our clean and intuitive design makes it easy for both beginners and experienced users to navigate and manage their crypto portfolios.
Real-Time Monitoring: Stay updated with real-time monitoring of your assets, transaction history, and market data.
Seamless Transactions: Easily send and receive cryptocurrencies with streamlined transaction processes.
Advanced Security: Benefit from state-of-the-art encryption and security protocols to protect your digital assets from unauthorized access.
Cross-Platform Compatibility: Use the KeepKey Client on various devices and platforms, ensuring you have access to your crypto assets wherever you go.
Why Choose KeepKey Client?

Trusted Security: KeepKey is renowned for its robust security measures, ensuring your assets are always safe.
Ease of Use: Designed with the user in mind, the KeepKey Client offers a hassle-free and efficient way to manage your crypto assets.
Comprehensive Support: Get support for a wide range of cryptocurrencies and seamless integration with your KeepKey hardware wallet.
Get Started:

Install the KeepKey Client extension.
Connect your KeepKey hardware wallet.
Start managing your crypto assets with ease and security.
Join thousands of satisfied users who trust KeepKey for their cryptocurrency management. Download the KeepKey Client today and take control of your digital assets!

Note: This extension requires a KeepKey hardware wallet to function. For more information, visit KeepKey's official website.
